title: How long does it take to respond to a support e-mail at the moment?
body:
I have 2 league of legends accounts and one of them is hacked.

When I was playing my main account i could see my second one was online.

A person from Hongkong was playing it. (He was responding to my chat. yes. and he said it was given from one of his mate)

After this chat he changed his player name and i can't track him any more.

I have followed instructions about retrieveing unrecoverable account and sent 3 e-mails.

but I still dont have any replies from Riot.

and Unrecoverable account help page didn't produce proper flag or proper thread i could check.

Please please help me out quick because I dont want this guy to use my account any longer.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Please do not send any more tickets in as this only pushes you to the back of the ticket queue, do not reply to any open tickets unless you receive a reply first as this will also push your ticket back.

Support is currently backed up at the moment and an initial response could take 48 hours or more. Do not worry however as your account should be locked as soon as someone from support receives your request and after an investigation (And you proving you are the original account holder) any actions taken on the account since it was compromised should be reversed.
